title: Health secretary to detail new Covid measures
content: The PM has already announced a tightening-up on mask-wearing and PCR tests for all arrivals in the UK.

title: Health secretary to detail new Covid measures
content: The PM has already announced a tightening-up on mask-wearing and PCR tests for all arrivals in the UK.

title: Patel not included in Calais migrant crisis talks
content: The home secretary says failure by Europe to co-operate with the UK could lead to "even worse scenes".

title: New rules to be set out amid Covid variant concern
content: The health secretary is due to give more detail on new measures after two UK Omicron cases were found.

title: Macron and Johnson clash over migrant boats
content: The French president accuses the UK prime minister of not being serious as diplomatic row escalates.

title: Has Sturgeon delivered on her conference pledges?
content: The SNP leader has made lots of policy pledges in her conference speeches - but have they been delivered on?

title: PM under pressure to act on migrant sea crossings
content: Lives remain at risk, but as the crisis persists, the greater the political risks for the PM too.

title: Whitty: Public would need to back more Covid curbs
content: England's chief medical officer wonders if "we could take people with us" if new restrictions are imposed.
